name: 8004Clawd
description:
Clawd x ERC-8004

The Clawd bot has been integrated with ERC-8004, Ethereum's newly announced standard.

This project enables on-chain-aware AI agents to perform actions, generate analyses, and coordinate in swarms when triggered by social platforms (X, Farcaster).

Objective:
To transform AI agents from mere conversational bots into economic actors operating on Ethereum.

Clawd + ERC-8004 =
Autonomous execution.
On-chain coordination.
Next-generation agent infrastructure.
